thread.title: McGraw Hill Financial Declares Quarterly Dividend
thread.title_full: McGraw Hill Financial Declares Quarterly Dividend

title: McGraw Hill Financial Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
, to shareholders of record on November 25, 2015 . The annualized dividend rate is $1.32 per share. 
McGraw Hill Financial has paid a dividend each year since 1937 and is one of fewer than 25 companies in the S&P 500 that has increased its dividend annually for at least the last 42 years. 
About : McGraw Hill Financial is a leading financial intelligence company providing the global capital and commodity markets with independent benchmarks, credit ratings, portfolio and enterprise risk solutions, and analytics. The Company's iconic brands include Standard & Poor's Ratings Services , S&P Capital IQ and SNL, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, CRISIL
